name: NSMetadataQueryResultGroup
desc: The NSMetadataQueryResultGroup class represents a collection of grouped attribute results returned by an NSMetadataQuery object.

items.name: var results: [Any]
items.desc: An array containing the result group’s result objects.

items.name: var resultCount: Int
items.desc: The number of results returned by the result group.

items.name: func result(at: Int) -> Any
items.desc: Returns the query result at a specific index.

items.name: var subgroups: [NSMetadataQueryResultGroup]?
items.desc: An array containing the result group’s subgroups.
